author: fabiocos
body:
As discussed in #25991, this PR proposes a few test workflows to test the reconstruction of low pt electrons for B parking and the corresponding skim. The existing workflow 136.898 is updated, a variant of 136.85 Egamma2018A (136.8501) adding B parking is provided, and the MC TTbar 2018 sample 10824.8 variant with the low pt electron reconstruction is added.

The three workflows have been tested to run on the canonical test sample size.
title: Add B parking test workflows
